oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter from Pvt. William Burton to his parents
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Pvt. William Burton, Co. F, 2nd Ky. Cav., USA, wrote to his parents, James and Elizabeth, to let them know that he was doing well. He sadly reported that his brother James R. Burton had died March 7th. James Burton served with Co. A, 19th Ky. Inf., USA. He wrote that James "Died the Death many of a Soldier has Died." [Roots Web info - James R. was a Sgt. & died at Young's Point, La.]
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Tennessee State Library and Archives, Nashville, Davidson County, Tennessee
